inviteFriends: New to whispeer? Invite your friends now!

patronize.heading: Support whispeer
patronize.content: whispeer is free to use but creates a great cost for us (like server rent and development-costs). If you want to support whispeer, we gratefully accept your donation.

details.bankContent: Transfer any amount of money you choose!
details.paypal: Donate any amount you want via paypal!

thanks.heading: Thanks for your donation!
thanks.content: Thanks for supporting the development and operation of whispeer!

recovery.title: Account recovery
recovery.explanation: Your account can not be recovered automatically yet. {br} If you forgot your password please send an e-mail to {mail}. {br} Never send your backup key to anyone not even us!

invite.title: whispeer is more fun with friends! Spread the word!
invite.viaMailExplanation: Enter your friends' e-mail addresses to invite them:
invite.viaLinkExplanation: Generate an invite link that you can pass on to your friends:
invite.yourName: Let your friends know who is inviting them (optional):
invite.name: Name
invite.shareText: Share your private thoughts on whispeer!

backup.explanation: If you forget your password for whispeer, you don't have access to your account anymore. To reset your password, you need a particular code which is generetaded specifically for you. You will find that code in the file. Please download the file or print it out, so we can give you access to your account again if needed.
backup.impossible:
You can not download your backup key with this device! 
 If you forget your password for whispeer, you don't have access to your account anymore. 
 Please use a different device to download or print your backup key!

circles.personCount: There are {count} people in this Circle

start.welcome: Welcome to whispeer - the secure social network!

landingpage.heading: Your privacy - our commitment!
landingpage.paragraphOne: whispeer is a social network that has specialized on the security of your data. We completely encrypt all communication from end to end.
landingpage.paragraphTwo: To register an account we only need a username and a password. Everything else is optional.
landingpage.featureOneProse: Everything is de- and encrypted on the client. Only chosen recipients can read messages, no eavesdropping third
landingpage.featureTwoProse: All personal details are optional, you may have as many accounts as you like, and usage of pseudonyms is encouraged
landingpage.featureThreeProse: There are no ads, payment is voluntary and premium features can be additionally purchased
landingpage.inviteExplain: You need an invitation to register for whispeer. We decided to take this step, so that we can provide the best service possible â€” both short term and in the long run. Soon we will be open to everyone and able to offer whispeer accounts without invitation. Use the time until then to invite your family and friends to join whispeer!

more.paragraphOne: With most services you have to trust your provider to secure your data. With whispeer, we give control over your data back to you. Encryption secures your data from prying eyes, including ours.
more.paragraphTwo: We enjoy offering as much security as possible, which is why you have to use at least eight characters for your password. We recommend a password length of over 12 characters and a combination of lower- and uppercase letters, symbols and digits.
more.paragraphThree: Your first and last name is optional and can be entered on your profile setup page directly following your registration. You can also enter your e-mail address if you want to. We will use it only to tell you about whispeer news, and nobody except the whispeer team will be able to see it.
more.paragraphFour: In addition to that, you can add other data to your profile, including your date of birth, the city you live in and your relationship status.  Each information is encrypted and will initially only be visible to you. You can then define the rights for each and every piece of information, defining exactly who can see what. You want your friends to see your date of birth, but not where you currently live? No problem. Everyone belonging to your circle 'Colleagues' should see where you work, but not your relationship status? Easy. Just enter your settings and add individual friends, or whole groups for each part. You stay in control.

zeroContent.firstPostText: My first whispeer post! Fully encrypted!

register.intro: Please type in your gender, name, birthday and city you live in. With this information, your friends on whispeer can find you more easily. We don't force you to do so, though! It is completely up to you.
